tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_transformations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transformation_name VARCHAR,
    transformation_details TEXT,
    transformation_query TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    extraction_source_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (extraction_source_id) REFERENCES extraction_sources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE extraction_source (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_location VARCHAR(255),
    extraction_frequency VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_transformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transformation_type VARCHAR(50),
    transformation_script TEXT,
    transformation_description TEXT,
    transformation_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE reporting_config (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_frequency VARCHAR(50),
    report_destination VARCHAR(255),
    report_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources_mapping ( 
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    source_id INT, 
    transformation_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES extraction_sources(source_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (transformation_id) REFERENCES data_transformation(transformation_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE reporting_data ( 
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    report_name VARCHAR(255), 
    report_date DATE, 
    transformation_id INT, 
    mapping_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (transformation_id) REFERENCES data_transformation(transformation_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (mapping_id) REFERENCES data_sources_mapping(mapping_id) 
);
